changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS film ( id varchar(100) PRIMARY KEY, category varchar(100) NOT NULL, description varchar(500) NOT NULL, preview_img varchar(100) NOT NULL, title varchar(100) NOT NULL, trailer_link varchar(100) NOT NULL, year varchar(10) NOT NULL, bg_img varchar(100) NOT NULL, rating varchar(10) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_user_roles ( user_id varchar(100) PRIMARY KEY, roles_id varchar(100) NOT NULL )
